info.name: FunPay Dark Purple Theme by GIOS (Working now)
info.description:
New look of the site "FunPay.ru". Made by GIOS. Dark purple theme for the site is the best design solution, all the pleasant shades of purple are selected. You will like it. 
Author of the work is GIOS.
info.additionalInfo:
Credits: https://funpay.ru/users/366366/
               https://qiwi.com/n/APPOQESE
Changle log: v1.01
 (21.10) The color display in some sections has been fixed. We emphasized all the brightness and subtleties of color. Added a glow on the falling tab. Corrected the color in the table.
_________________________________________________________________________________________________
v2.0
(23.10) Updated colors for the new site style. It works properly, everything is as it should be.
Fixed display of colors in some places.
_________________________________________________________________________________________________
v2.01
(06.12) Corrected color, wherever possible.
